cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Manage your project without leaving your code. Open your Kanban board directly in a VS Code tab.

cue.label: Workflow
cue.voice: Drag issues, edit details, and filter tasks while your code remains visible right next to it. Zero context switching.

cue.label: Access
cue.voice: Access the board instantly from the Activity Bar or Command Palette. Click an issue ID in a comment to jump straight to the details.

cue.label: Install
cue.voice: The Kanbus extension is open source and available for free. Install it from the Marketplace today.
